#include <iostream>
#include <cmath>
using namespace std;

int main(){
	int n;
	cin >> n;
	string s;
	cin >> s;
	float x; 
	float y; 
	cin >> x >> y;
	int check = 0;
	float angle = 0.0;
	for (int i = 0; i < s.length(); i++){
		if (s[i] == 'R')
			angle += x;
		else 
			angle -= x;
		if (abs(angle) >= y){
			cout << "NO" << endl;
			check = 1;
			break;
		}
	}
	if (check == 0)
		cout << "YES" << endl;
	return 0;
}
